mapper.insert: insert into qrtz_simple_triggers (`TRIGGER_NAME`, TRIGGER_GROUP, REPEAT_COUNT, REPEAT_INTERVAL, TIMES_TRIGGERED) values (#{triggerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{triggerGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repeatCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{repeatInterval,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{timesTriggered,jdbcType=BIGINT})
